alert.note: Alert for Woodward (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 27 at 9:26AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Woodward County through 1000 AM CDT... At 925 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Woodward. The storm is nearly stationary, but is building to the east. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Woodward and Tangier. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
